Source code for Feas_set.Feas_set

import polytope
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np


[docs]class feasible_set:

    def __init__(self, poly = None):
        """
        Define feasible set as a Polytope

        :param poly:
        """
        if poly is not None:
            self.set = poly


[docs]    def plot(self):
        """
        Plot the polytope

        :return:
        """
        l,u = polytope.bounding_box(self.set)
        fig = plt.figure()
        ax = fig.add_subplot(111)
        self.set.plot(ax=ax)
        plt.xlim(np.array([l[0], u[0]]))
        plt.ylim(np.array([l[1], u[1]]))
        plt.show()



    def __str__(self):
       return self.set.__str__()
